field.name: epay_windowstate
field.label: Window state
field.description: How the payment window should open.

field.name: epay_group
field.label: Group
field.description: This setting is used to assign the payment to a specific group within the payment system.

field.name: epay_currencies
field.label: Available currencies
field.description: Select one or more items from the list. You can use Ctrl-click to select more than one item.

field.name: epay_paymentconfirmation
field.label: E-mail payment confirmation
field.description: If you have multiple receivers you can separate the list by semicolon (;).

field.name: epay_instantcapture
field.label: Instant capture
field.description: This is used if you wish to capture the payments at the same time as it is authorized. This option may only be used if the cardholder receives the goods at once.

field.name: epay_md5key
field.label: MD5 key
field.description: This is the secret password you must enter both here and within the payment system if you enable MD5 above. Notice that the secret password must be 100% the same. Otherwise the customer will be declined as payments are made. You can log into your account on the payment system here. The MD5 settings are to be found from the menu Settings -> Payment System.

field.name: epay_authsms
field.label: Auth SMS number
field.description: This is the secret password you must enter both here and within the payment system if you enable MD5 above. Notice that the secret password must be 100% the same. Otherwise the customer will be declined as payments are made. You can log into your account on the payment system here. The MD5 settings are to be found from the menu Settings -> Payment System.

field.name: epay_authmail
field.label: Auth E-mail
field.description: The auth mail setting is used if you need to receive an e-mail with payment information from the payment system as the payment is made. If you have multiple receivers you can separate the list by semicolon (;).
